author: scottbw
msg: Updated the proxy service code to handle POST requests and BASIC AUTH (Thanks to Henning Eriksson for the patch). This fixes WOOKIE-116. Also made some changes to make the servlet easier to run tests against (such as using standard HTTP error codes rather than custom error messages), and added some test cases.

author: slaws
msg: Disable the generic basic auth provider as it's replaced now by the ws binding specific version

author: slaws
msg: Move securityIdentity policy into Tuscany namespace

author: slaws
msg: Enable the ws binding specific basic auth policy provider
